result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.html: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: February is "Black History Month" in America.
result.ga: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i Meiriceá
result.orig: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i Meiriceá
result.html: Is é Feabhra Mí Stair an Chine Ghoirm i MeiriceáFebruary is "Black History Month" in America.
result.ponchtml: Is é Feaḃra Mí Stair an Ċine Ġoirm i MeiriceáFebruary is "Black History Month" in America.

result.eng: Among the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ga: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.orig: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine geal
result.html: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den chine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
result.ponchtml: I measc 60 duine ar an mbus ba mise an t-aon duine den ċine gealAmong the 60 people on the bus, I was the only white person.
